attributes.background: More and more abusive parents are using the CMS system to continue abuse over children and ex partner

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about financial control through the CMS but we are not sure what change you would like the Government to make.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what changes you would like the UK Government or Parliament to make.
